source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SEQ_00<tab>The straightforward broom will share with you his knowledge in exchange for a straightforward task.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SEQ_00<tab>マトーヤの洞窟の一本気なホウキは、サッサカ掃除をしているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SEQ_01<tab>The straightforward broom offers to share with you his knowledge, but you must first bring him the object he desires: a signpost for aetherial travel, which he describes as sparkly, glowy, and angularly. Such signposts used to be commonplace in Sharlayan. Search for the mystery object in the ruins of the city.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SEQ_01<tab>知識を望んだ冒険者は、交換条件として、一本気なホウキの望みを叶えることになった。一本気なホウキは「エーテルの旅の道標」を探しているらしい。低地ドラヴァニアで、それらしきものを探そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SEQ_02<tab>You have acquired a disused aetheryte shard, which is most certainly what the straightforward broom desires. Make your way back to Matoya's Cave and present your discovery to him.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C3001 /var>から、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6701 /var>を入手した。マトーヤの洞窟の「一本気なホウキ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6701 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SEQ_03<tab>The straightforward broom accepts the aetheryte shard with glee. As promised, he shares with you his knowledge─the fruits of Matoya's research into aether. Unfortunately, he does not seem to know what his mistress desires...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SEQ_03<tab>一本気なホウキに、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6701 /var>を渡した。望みが叶って喜んだ一本気なホウキは、マトーヤのエーテル研究の成果について教えてくれた。しかし、マトーヤの望みについては知らないようだ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_TODO_00<tab>Find the object of the straightforward broom's desire in the Dravanian hinterlands.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_TODO_00<tab>低地ドラヴァニアで一本気なホウキの望むものを探す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the aetheryte shard to the straightforward broom in Matoya's Cave.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_TODO_01<tab>マトーヤの洞窟の一本気なホウキに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B6701 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>Should you choose to undertake this quest, you will receive no guidance from the journal or the duty list. You will need to read the text carefully and decipher the clues to determine your next course of action.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_SYSTEM_000_000本クエストは「探索型クエスト」です。
進行中、ジャーナルや目的リストや地図に、
ヒントが表示されない場合があります。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_001<tab>Nam on skees egdelwonk, swish-swish-aroo! But if you desire my knowledge, you must first grant me my heart's desire!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_001ナニカ、ゴヨウデ、サッサカサ！
ボクらの知識を望むなら、ボクらの望みも叶えてヨ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_002<tab>Nothing fascinates me more than aether. Streams of it go round and round the world like a great tangle of ribbons! When one rides such a stream, where will one end up? I often engage in such musings.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_002ボク、エーテルに興味シンシン！
エーテルは、世界をぐるぐるしてるでショウ？
流れにのって旅してみたら、いったいどこまで行けるカナ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_003<tab>But even as I muse, I frighten myself silly. For instance, what if I were to arrive at my destination only to find that there is no dust to sweep? Can you imagine a worse fate?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_003だけど、ちょっぴり怖いよネ。
行き着く先に塵がなければ、ホウキの存在理由もないし。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_004<tab>Of course you can't─you are not a broom. But I am, and I require a safety measure, something that will point the way home no matter where I find myself. A signpost for aetherial travel, as it were─sparkly, glowy, angularly!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_004どこへ行っても戻れるように、道標がほしいのサ。
エーテルの旅の道標。
キラキラ、ゴツゴツ、ピッカピカ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_005<tab>Such signposts used to be commonplace in Sharlayan. If you can find one and bring it to me, I will share my knowledge with you!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_005シャーレアンの都では、いたるところにあったらしいし、
今もそのへんにあるんじゃナイ？
探して持ってきてくれたら、ボクの知識をオスソワケ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_010<tab>I desire a signpost for aetherial travel─sparkly, glowy, angularly.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_010ボクがキミに望むのは、エーテルの旅の道標。
キラキラ、ゴツゴツ、ピッカピカ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_011<tab>Such signposts used to be commonplace in Sharlayan. If you can find one and bring it to me, I will share my knowledge with you!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_011シャーレアンの都では、いたるところにあったらしいし、
今もそのへんにあるんじゃナイ？
探して持ってきてくれたら、ボクの知識をオスソワケ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_030<tab>Snruter rerutnevda evarb eht, swish-swish-aroo! Did you find it? A signpost for aetherial travel?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_030オカエリ、ナサイデ、サッサカサ！
それで、サッサと見つかった？
エーテルの旅の道標！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_031<tab>Yes, this is precisely what I wanted! With this, I can always find my way home! I need not fear being condemned to a dustless life!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_031ソウソウ、コレコレ、サッサカサ！
ぐるぐる渦巻くエーテルに、ここから飛び込み、飛び出すトカ。
……よしよし、これで怖いものなしサ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_032<tab>As promised, I will share with you such knowledge as I have received from my mistress. That is, the fruits of her research into aether!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_032それじゃあ、サッサと教えるヨ！
ボクがマトーヤ様から授かった知識……
ずばり、「エーテル研究の成果」にツイテ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_033<tab>Aether is the thread from which all creation is woven, and Mistress Matoya has devoted her life to unraveling its secrets.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_033エーテルについて知ることは、万物の成立ちを紐解くコト。
つまるところマトーヤ様は、ずーっと世界に挑んできたのサ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_034<tab>Over the years, she has made discoveries beyond count. Why, if I had a bristle for each one, I would be a rich broom indeed!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_034その成果ったら膨大で、
ボクの穂の隙間にぎゅうぎゅう詰めても、
全然おさまらないとキタ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_035<tab>But wealth is a thing to be shared, and the fruits of my mistress's research are distributed among my brother brooms and our distant relatives, the tomes.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_035今は仕舞われているけれど、
たくさんのホウキの兄さんや姉さん、親戚の本たちが、
分担して成果を記憶してるヨ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_036<tab>...Oh? You wished only to know what my mistress desires? I am afraid I cannot tell you, for she never imparted that knowledge to me. Sorry to disappoint!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ902_01967_BROOMA_000_036……エッ？　知りたいのは、マトーヤ様の「望み」ダッテ？
あらあら残念、それはボクの知らないことサ。
だって、教えられていないモノ！
